foodSearchCriteria.description: A copy of the criteria that were used in the search.

items.description: JSON for request body of 'search' POST request

query.description: Search terms to use in the search. The string may also include standard [search operators](https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/help.html#bkmk-2)

dataType.description: Optional. Filter on a specific data type; specify one or more values in an array.

pageSize.description: Optional. Maximum number of results to return for the current page. Default is 50.

pageNumber.description: Optional. Page number to retrieve. The offset into the overall result set is expressed as (pageNumber * pageSize)

sortBy.description: Optional. Specify one of the possible values to sort by that field. Note, dataType.keyword will be dataType and lowercaseDescription.keyword will be description in future releases.

sortOrder.description: Optional. The sort direction for the results. Only applicable if sortBy is specified.

brandOwner.description: Optional. Filter results based on the brand owner of the food. Only applies to Branded Foods.

totalHits.description: The total number of foods found matching the search criteria.

currentPage.description: The current page of results being returned.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages found matching the search criteria.

foods.description: The list of foods found matching the search criteria. See Food Fields below.

dataType.description: The type of the food data.

foodCode.description: Any A unique ID identifying the food within FNDDS.

derivationDescription.example: Calculated from a daily value percentage per serving size measure

publicationDate.description: Date the item was published to FDC.

scientificName.description: The scientific name of the food.

brandOwner.description: Brand owner for the food. Only applies to Branded Foods.

gtinUpc.description: GTIN or UPC code identifying the food. Only applies to Branded Foods.

ingredients.description: The list of ingredients (as it appears on the product label). Only applies to Branded Foods.

ndbNumber.description: Unique number assigned for foundation foods. Only applies to Foundation and SRLegacy Foods.

additionalDescriptions.description: Any additional descriptions of the food.
additionalDescriptions.example: Coon; sharp cheese; Tillamook; Hoop; Pioneer; New York; Wisconsin; Longhorn

score.description: Relative score indicating how well the food matches the search criteria.
